titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Major C Christie, Paymaster, Tabrez [Tabriz]

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing abstracts (not present) for pay and allowances for the detachment of troops en route to Tabreez [Tabriz], along with muster rolls (also not present) from September to December 1812.Enclosed with the letter is a list of packages sent with the aforementioned detachment, along with the cost of the mules used to transport them.
